duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely move all “the parts” in to, out of and around the warehouse and data center environment using a variety of technology and equipment to support the Logistics Team in the daily execution of service operations.
Ensure compliance of operational execution in line with Standard Operating Practices and Work Instructions.
Maintain strict inventory control and conduct accurate system transactions.
Transport inventory by hand, material handling equipment (i.e. forklifts or pallet jacks) and box truck in accordance with all safety procedures and protocol.
Complete other duties as required with consideration for quality, safety, and efficiency.
Escalate areas of service non-compliance in a timely and effective manner to support investigation and remediation.
Participate in all assigned training to support the execution of assigned responsibilities.
Ensure proactive customer service support to the Client and other operational teams as required.

education_certification.credential: Current valid driver’s license and ability to pass a Motor Vehicle Record Check.
Ability to pass a Department of Transportation (DOT) Medical Card physical exam (US only).
1+ years of material handling in a warehouse, manufacturing, or distribution center environment.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Able to safely lift and move a minimum of fifty (50) pounds and can stand the duration of the shift.
